ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] From a magician list. A little more info
ygData.msgSnippet: Stackable items are never used in a trade skill.  Stackable items count as 1 item when stacked. - Tony Buser - gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land ---
ygData.messageBody:
Stackable items are never used in a trade skill. Stackable items count as
1 item when stacked.

- Tony Buser - gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land --- http://www.juju.org -
- Ubershadow Leprechaun - Level 36 Gnome Rogue - http://tunares.juju.org -
- perl -e'print pack("H*","54686f752041727420476f640a");' ----------------
